column5: Starting from October 2020, the Master’s Degree in Biomedical Omics will be part of the educational offer of the University of Milan. Omics technologies - including genomics, proteomics, transcriptomics, metabolomics, radiomics, etc. - are novel comprehensive approaches that provide complete molecular characterization of individual organisms. Omics have a rapidly increasing range of applications in biomedicine, including diagnostics and patient stratification, basic and translational biomedical research, and are leading the way towards personalized or precision medicine. The Master’s Degree in Biomedical Omics aims to train specialists in omics technologies who will work in clinical or research laboratories or biotech companies.
column7: All info available at Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
